tweet: Farmers are some of the most innovative people in our country and their livelihoods sustain the world. Let’s thank them today and every day for their dedication to feeding our families and moving America forward. Read @SecretarySonny's op-ed below: https://bit.ly/2K3rH9i

Members of my staff will be hosting mobile office hours this Wednesday, July 31st, at the Attica Public Library from 1-4pm (ET). Stop by and say hello!

305 S. Perry St., Attica, IN 47918

Dan Coats served Hoosiers & our nation with integrity & principle throughout his career as a devoted public servant. He served our country exceptionally well as Director of National Intelligence, and we thank him for his leadership on so many complex issues impacting our nation.

USMCA strengthens our partnerships and improves trade across North America so we can remain competitive and lead the world. It’s a win for Hoosiers and for our nation – the time to vote is now. Read my op-ed below: https://www.jconline.com/story/news/opinion/letters/2019/07/10/rep-jim-baird-its-time-vote-u-s-mexico-canada-agreement/1700628001/ …

Until now, NDAA has been bipartisan for over 50 years, with both sides of the aisle coming together to support our military. I’m proud to stand with my @HouseGOP colleagues calling on House Democrats to put our troops and security first. pic.twitter.com/MVynyxXDEB

It’s time to bring USMCA up for a vote — we must act now to kick start a new era of stronger modernized trade. Read my op-ed in @jconline below:
 https://www.jconline.com/story/news/opinion/letters/2019/07/10/rep-jim-baird-its-time-vote-u-s-mexico-canada-agreement/1700628001/ …

Black vulture attacks on newborn calves can have a significant impact on profitability for our Hoosier cow calf producers. I’m proud to co-sponsor the Livestock Protection Act to give farmers and ranchers the freedom they need to protect their livestock. https://bit.ly/2S6VBMs

Applications for fall 2019 semester internships in both our Washington, D.C. office and Danville office are due no later than this Friday, July 12! Click below to learn more and apply:  https://baird.house.gov/media/press-releases/congressman-baird-accept-applications-fall-2019-internships …
